name: Ajax Login
author: EasyLoopSoft Team

sections.description:
Ajax Login demo: http://pmzez.com/plugins/ajax-login

Go to “Ajax Login Menu to Find shortcode OR Appearance to Widgets and find els Ajax Login”

Plugin Features:

  • Click to Loading a progress bar and redirect to admin page.
  • Enable ajax login in wp-login.php page.
  • Add ajax login widget.
  • Ajax’y applications.
  • Added WP Security.
  • Form class name customizable.
  • Dynamically call jQuery Library.
  • Fully Responsive.
  • Mobile supported.
  • Very Lightweight.
    & many More

Youtube :
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jEQ9w76rJk8

Live Preview: http://pmzez.com/plugins/ajax-login
sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin.

  • After Installed this plugin will work properly.

  • Go to Ajax Login Menu >> Find shortcode OR Appearance >> Widgets and find els Ajax Login.

  • Enjoy

short_description: Ajax Login is a sample login interface that you login your admin panel by using ajax.
